name: Lore: A Stealth Action Game
description:
Lore: A Stealth Action Game

By Max Schmid

Lore is a stealth horror game about finding your grandfather, who went missing near his cottage in the woods. Avoid a mysterious man hunting you down in the woods.

Play as college student Bethany as she returns to her grandfather’s cottage after a year long silence between them after a large argument. Avoid a mysterious man as he searches the forest for you, as you try to open the mysterious underground catacomb.

The game features:

- tactical stealth gameplay

- adaptive AI who counter attacks your strategies

- a large world full of mystery

Lore's gameplay is being ironed out, balanced and tested with new features. Cutscenes and dialogue are being worked on as well.
